text: Lawrence Elion (November 5, 1917 – March 27, 2011) was a Canadian / British actor who was best known for his role as the hapless first victim Stanley in David Winning's debut feature film Storm. Lawrence was born in Brentford, Chiswick, England. He served in the Signal Corps of the British Army during World War II. Lawrence had a passion for music (piano) and the theatre, was a member of ACTRA and won numerous awards for 'Best Actor'.
